items.sentence: Turn left at the next intersection, and walk about half a block, and you'll see the post office on your right.
A lot of banging and cussing could be heard coming out of the garage when Tom was trying to fix the lawnmower.
Tom was driving too close to the car in front of him, and was unable to stop in time when it suddenly stopped.
A person will have the face of an angel when borrowing something, but the face of the devil when returning it.
The police suspected there was a connection between the abandoned car and the dead body found three miles away.
